title: Display Red Bus routes and fares in application

requirements.text: Ensure Red Bus routes with transport type 'bus' are stored in the backend with complete fare breakdown including base fare, taxes, and service fees

quotes: red bus route and its fare are not reflected in project

acceptanceCriteria: Backend returns Red Bus routes when querying all routes
Red Bus route data includes operator name, origin, destination, schedule, and complete rate breakdown
Rate breakdown contains base fare, tax amount, service fee, and total fare calculations

requirements.text: Display Red Bus routes in the search results page with correct fare information showing the complete pricing breakdown

quotes: red bus route and its fare are not reflected in project

acceptanceCriteria: Red Bus routes appear in search results when filtering by bus transport type
Route cards display the total fare calculated from base fare + taxes + service fees
Fare breakdown is visible in route details showing itemized costs

requirements.text: Verify Red Bus routes are correctly rendered in the AdminRoutesTable with full rate breakdown details visible

quotes: red bus route and its fare are not reflected in project

acceptanceCriteria: Red Bus entries appear in the admin routes table
Rate breakdown columns show base fare, taxes, service fees, and total for Red Bus routes
Edit and delete actions work correctly for Red Bus routes

constraints: Use existing Route data structure with rate breakdown fields (baseFare, taxes, serviceFee)
Maintain compatibility with current search and filtering logic
Preserve existing transport type handling for train, bus, and taxi
nonGoals: Adding new transport types beyond existing bus, train, taxi
Modifying the rate calculation formula or pricing structure
Changes to booking flow or payment integration
